name: LockResult

methods.name: getErrors
methods.description: If an error occurred, returns an array of one or more database error objects, providing the error code and description.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the sObject you are trying to lock.

methods.name: isSuccess
methods.description: A Boolean value that is set to true if the lock operation is successful for this object, or false otherwise.

description: The result of a record lock returned by a System.Approval.lock() method.
